title: Elon’s cringey Tesla bop is part of a long line of awkward tech CEO dances — a ranking
content:
If you’ve been on Twitter in the last two days, chances are that you’ve seen a video online of The Richest Man Alive™, celebrating. After months of COVID delays and issues with construction permits due to environmental concerns, Elon Musk finally made it to Berlin this week to officially open Tesla’s new Gigafactory. ‘Giga’ is no exaggeration – the manufacturing hub is ready to deliver 500,000 Teslas into this world every year. While the first Model Y cars were presented to their new owners, Elon delivered on a promise he made earlier this month on – what else – Twitter.…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Tesla
description: After seeing Elon dance we wondered: Which tech mogul is the best dancer? Here are 5 of the best CEO dance videos around.
